data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during GOSPORT cruise from Plymouth to St. Johns started at 1758-05-30

Ship: Gosport (5th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Plymouth - St Johns, 1st Observer: Richard Edwards (Captain), 2nd Observer: John Chapman (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 44G 678BM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
